full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Bid Solicitation Title**
Stacking Washers and Dryers

**Reference Number**: WS4085795132-Doc4117958525
**Amendment Number**: 3

**Publication Date**: August 10, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: September 7, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT
**Expected Contract Start Date**: October 6, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date**: September 15, 2023

**Tender Status**: Expired

**UNSpsc Codes**: 31161800 (Washers)
**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposals
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Bid Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price
**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Areas of Operation**: Winnipeg

**Delivery Regions**: Winnipeg

**Government Department**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
**Buyer Contact Information**: Oana Lee (elle-la / she-her)
**Buyer Email**: oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Tender Description**
Canada is soliciting offers from qualified contractors to provide the supply, delivery, and installation of eight (8) Light Commercial, small chassis, stacking washers and dryers for Correctional Services Canada, along with an option to purchase four (4) additional units. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by September 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT.

**Relevant Attachments**: None

Learn More | [View Tender Posting](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17134712?extsite=MTcxMzQ3MTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

---

Note:

1. Stripped off excess keywords and made relevant formatting with headings. 
2. Fix grammatical errors, and inconsistencies. 
3. Doesn't include high pile of keyword but necessary parameters of tender.
